title: Maybe bind VolumetricConvolution (no MM) in ATen?
body_html: We currently bind THNN VolumetricConvolutionMM as conv3d, but we don't bind VolumetricConvolution. Instead, VolumetricConvolution is used purely by the legacy NN. Should we bind it in ATen, or is it just legacy code that no one should use if they can avoid it?
body_text: We currently bind THNN VolumetricConvolutionMM as conv3d, but we don't bind VolumetricConvolution. Instead, VolumetricConvolution is used purely by the legacy NN. Should we bind it in ATen, or is it just legacy code that no one should use if they can avoid it?
